Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim better than ever
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Abbott "read listen 'n learn"
Reviews.Content: This Casio Exilim Z550 14.1 MP digital camera, purchased from Amazon, replaces a Casio 6 MP camera that I used for years. This one also takes great pics; great color, great detail. Much improved. Downside: must remove battery for recharging; my old one had a much more convenient dock for recharging - liked that feature much better. Otherwise I'm happy with with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera when the lens opens
Reviews.Author: Joyce Downs
Reviews.Content: I used this camera for one day, while on vacation, was terrific. The second day the lens would not open. I exchanged it a few days later. I used the replacement for one day and it was great. The next time I used it, the lens opened only after the butterfly flew away. It currently will not open. Lens error try again. I love the zoom. But, with the unreliable lens I must find an alternate camera. Hopefully, I can return this one.

Reviews.Title: Luv It!
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: 1 Rechargeable batteries = ***** 52 Small and attractive = ***** 53 Inexpensive = ***** 54 Over and above support for Eye-Fi = ***** 55 Decent features = **** 46 Picture quality = ***** 57 Ease of use = ***** 5I take an estimated 230 pictures a day about 340 days a year. This camera was purchased as a back up to a backup camera. Due to the features, ease of use, picture quality, and Extra Eye-fi support built in, it is now my main field work camera. It does take 2 batteries to get through the full day. With so many pictures taken daily, I will not even consider a camera without a rechargeable Lithium battery. The camera exceeded my expectations. This is number 2 bought for me. 5 Star

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: LooHoo99338
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything I could hope for in a camera. I have yet to take a fuzzy, out of focus, poorly lit photo. I took a video today which was also great quality. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: A really good small camera
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I have owned several Casio cameras in the past. My previous Casio camera was a 7-megapixel unit that failed after several years of heavy use. This new camera is easy for me to use when making video clips.  It also does a really good job for still pictures.  Nothing negative to report.

Reviews.Title: good but thicker than average Casio
Reviews.Author: lilylu
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a nonprofessional photographer like me. But a little bit thicker than I thought it would be. The Amazon pictures did not show how thick it is.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, don't buy for HD capabilities
Reviews.Author: Bradley Pool
Reviews.Content: What can I say?  It takes great pictures!  It does a lot of stuff!  I love how it uses battery backs instead of AA batteries!  The zoom works very nice!  The video quality is pretty decent!The only thing I can say is that if you're looking for a camera to take good HD video this isn't the best choice.  SD quality is EXCELLENT but the HD quality really looks no better than the SD quality.  It has a kind of grainy look to it and is widescreen format.All in all it's a great camera.  Personally, I paid extra for this model over other models because of its HD video modes.  Keep in mind the video quality isn't BAD but it isn't as good as some better models.However, for a sub $100 camera its quality is pretty decent.

Reviews.Title: casio
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. Worman "Kimberly Worman"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and great shots! I got this from Amazon for $79 it's worth every penney. Throw it in my purse and go!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: G. Miller
Reviews.Content: For under $100, this is a nice camera.  Takes nice shots, fast from photo to photo, decent battery life, small, and is compatible with Eye-Fi cards, which was a important to me.  Are there better cameras? Sure.  Are there cheaper cameras? Yes.  But bang for the buck, this is well worth what I paid.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful little camera
Reviews.Author: Ellen K. Sweeney "music lover"
Reviews.Content: This was a great camera. It took pictures as good if not better thsn my D3000 Nikon! But alas someone stole it from me. Curses!

Reviews.Title: Excelente Camara con buenos Graficos e Imagines nitidas
Reviews.Author: J. Correia "J.P."
Reviews.Content: Excelente Producto, recibido sin problemas en mis manos. Buenos colores y buen precio Gracias por el servicio y por buen producto.

Reviews.Title: why cant i give it zero stars
Reviews.Author: mauimom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my previous camera was a cassio and it lasted me about 5 years or so. Then it started glitching where it would focus but not take the photo. this camera did that exact same thing after a few months. I sent it back for warranty repair.. came back promptly but only worked for about a week then the same thing started happening again. I dont even care to send it back. I am done. I am much happier taking photos on my iphone..

Reviews.Title: Casio EX-Z550 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Brigitte Swift
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd. Casico I have purchased. It is so easy to use and takes really good photo's. If I like a product I will purcash it for friends. I will buy another for my Mom because she loves it also. Capture a smile! You will love this camera

Reviews.Title: Multiple problems after 3 months of use
Reviews.Author: R. Price
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for personal photos and take less than 100 shots per month.  Three months after purchase, I have multiple problems including (1) multiple lens errors (2) auto shutoff within seconds of power on (3) inability to zoom (4)sudden and severe overexposure no matter what the settings are.This is my 4th Casio Exilim and I have been very happy with all previous models.  They have proved sturdy and lasted until severe trauma was inflicted upon them (a dog ate two of them; I dropped the last one into water).  I have babied this camera, always carrying it in a case, never dropping it, and keeping it dry.Now I have to send it across country at my expense and also have to pay to have it returned.  This is absolutely the last time I will buy a Casio point and shoot digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Takes excellent pictures!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn
Reviews.Content: The camera takes excellent pictures, but the second day I got it, the lens got stuck. I guess any small particles, such as sand, dirt, dust are cons. Keep it away from those things!

Reviews.Title: Excelent!!!
Reviews.Author: Ledif Alberto Morales del Castillo
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, very good sharpness, pictures come out great, I sold them all XD!I recommend them to everyone who wants a good camera, simple and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Kristy
Reviews.Content: After reading a lot of reviews, I decided on this camera as a simple, inexpensive choice that would provide the best quality for the price (I bought it for about $90). The pictures taken were of decent quality - good focus and lighting. However, after 2 hours of using it for the first time, the photo capture button simply stopped working. When pressed it simply would do nothing. After talking to Casio technical support, I learned that there was nothing neither they nor I could do to fix it. I had no choice but to return it, (which was extremely inconvenient since I bought it for that specific weekend). So I would recommend the camera for a decent quality point and shoot for its price, but don't get it if you need it immediately, as it seems to have some technical difficulties.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1-megapixel resolution
4x wide-angle optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen
Newly-developed EXILIM Engine 5.0
Make composite images of different moving images with Dynamic Photo; Art Shot Function
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
Bundled Accessories:   Rechargeable lithium ion battery, lithium ion battery charger, AC power cord, USB cable, AV cable, strap, CD-ROM
ProductInfo.Name: Casio EX-Z550 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with CCD Shift Image Stabilization and 2.7 inch LCD (Red)
